narrative.narrative: Air Mauritanie was the flag carrier of the West African country of Mauritania from 1962-2007. Throughout its history it served nine domestic airports,and one each in Cape Verde,France,Gambia,Guinea-Bissau,Mali,Morocco,Senegal and Spain. At the end it had two 737-700's. It also operated ATR 42-300's,and at least one 737-200,DC-3,DC-4,Fokker F28-4000 and 6000,Fokker F27,and Il-18 series of planes over its history.

prefereds.aircrafts: Boeing 737-700,ATR 42-300,Boeing 737-200,Boeing 737-200 Adv.,DC-3,DC-4-1009,Fokker F28-4000,Fokker F28-6000,Fokker F27,Il-18E,Il-18D,Il-18V,Aerospatiale N262
